name: PLURK Superwash Merino Yarn
description:
I have been sucked into the time vortex that is Plurk.
This yarn originally was an "oops" skein, but as I looked at it more, it reminded me of the colours of the plurk pages.

Plurk
Purples, Burgundy, Orange...

100% Superwash Merino Sock Yarn
Fingering Weight
400 yards

Best knit on US 1-3 (2-3.25mm) needles.

Perfect for socks, scarves, hats.

Hand/machine wash cold; Air dry
**It is always best to hand wash your woolen items to prolong their life. Also, please hand wash separately first in case of any residual dye runoff. I set my dyes carefully, however with some colours there will be some dye that rinses in first washings**
